entry.tran: 即将来临的;即将发生的
entry.def: A forthcoming event is planned to happen soon.

example.tran: 他在即将来临的选举中的对手们

entry.tran: 会发生的;现成的;可得到的
entry.def: If something that you want, need, or expect is forthcoming, it is given to you or it happens.

example.ex: They promised that the money would be forthcoming...
We must first see some real evidence. So far it has not been forthcoming...
example.tran: 我们必须先看到一些实证，而到目前为止并没有看到。

entry.tran: 乐于提供信息的;愿意提供帮助的
entry.def: If you say that someone is forthcoming, you mean that they willingly give information when you ask them.

means.word_mean: 1. at ease in talking to others
3. available when required or as promised;
